fn.p: Milen Duarte conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Pablo C. Guerrero contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Mary T.K. Arroyo contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Ramiro O. Bustamante contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft, analysis.
